mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.replyId, r.nickname, r.reReply, r.inserted, r.updated, u.nickname, u.id uid, u.adminQuali FROM tb_rereply_news r JOIN tb_user u ON r.nickname = u.nickname WHERE r.replyId = #{replyId} AND u.withdrawal = 'X' ORDER BY r.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_rereply_news (replyId, nickname, reReply, boardId) VALUES (#{replyId}, #{nickname}, #{reReply}, #{boardId})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_rereply_news SET replyId = #{replyId}, reReply = #{reReply}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM tb_rereply_news WHERE replyId=#{replyId}
